price: Then it was struck by an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep,
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
